# buildingRpackages

The goal of buildingRpackages is to provide functions for reading in, working with, summarizing, and plotting, Fatality Analytis Reporting System (FARS) accident data.

## Installation

You can install the released version of buildingRpackages from github with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("ctaber/buildingRpackages")
```

## Example

To see examples of how this package works, please see the package vignette titled: 'model_detials'
